strings.Value: The familiar road rolled out before us as our hero{mf||ine} turned toward {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g}. At {mf|his|her} back, the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g} had yet to reveal all their secrets to the daring adventurer who had decided {mf||s}he would be the one to conquer them...

But really, what would be the point of such a strange endeavor? Much easier to just return to the reliable shelter of {g|Restov}Restov{/g}'s walls, set up shop, maybe start a family, and live out the rest of your days like any other citizen — in peace, warmth, a bit of boredom, and the full confidence that tomorrow will be just as orderly and predictable as yesterday...

Hey, did you really think I'd choose a hero{mf||ine} like that for my book?! Ridiculous! No, our daring leader, after indulging in a bit of nostalgia for that old {g|Restov}Restov{/g} flair, turned {mf|his|her} back on faraway {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g} and followed the call of destiny — to the unpredictable, wild, beautiful {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}!
